questions.text: What is meant by inflationary expansion?
questions.optionA: A theory about exponentially increasing space in early universe
questions.optionB: A theory about exponentially many metorite impacts on the young earth
questions.optionC: A theory about exponentially many atoms in molecular bonds
questions.optionD: A theory about exponentially increasing number of species before humans conquered the worlds

questions.text: How large is the excess of matter compared to antimatter at the big bang assumed to be?
What is the ratio of atoms to dark matter to dark energy?

questions.optionA: To determine the elements composition of distant stars
questions.optionB: To draw the Pythogoras triangle in four-dimensional space
questions.optionC: To determine the distance to stars using the redshift.
questions.optionD: To determine the rotation of start using the Doppler effect
